trans-unit.source: Represents a signed rights managed publish license.
<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> defines security data about rights, users, and other security-related information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> 権限、ユーザー、およびその他のセキュリティに関連する情報に関するセキュリティ データを定義します。

trans-unit.source: The license defines how a specific user on a specific computer can use specified rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: ライセンスは、特定のコンピューター上の特定のユーザーが指定された権限管理コンテンツを使用する方法を定義します。

trans-unit.source: The publishing process begins with the document author, who defines rights information in an <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>.
trans-unit.target: 公開プロセスでは、ドキュメントの作成者の権利の情報を定義すると、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>です。

trans-unit.source: Next, the author creates a signed <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> by calling the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Sign%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>.
trans-unit.target: 次に、作成者は、作成、署名付き<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>を呼び出して、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Sign%2A>のメソッド、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>です。

trans-unit.source: The serialized form of the signed <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> can then be provided to end users who can use it to acquire a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> by calling the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.AcquireUseLicense%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>.
trans-unit.target: シリアル化形式を符号付きの<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>し、使用して、取得しているエンドユーザーに提供できる、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>を呼び出して、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.AcquireUseLicense%2A>のメソッド、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>です。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> then allows the client application to exercise the rights that were granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: 返された<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>がユーザーに付与されている権限を行使するクライアント アプリケーションを使用します。

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: その他の同様<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>型、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>は完全信頼アプリケーションで使用できるのみです。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to initialize a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> by using the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Sign%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 次の例は、初期化する方法を示します、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>を使用して、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.Sign%2A>メソッドです。

trans-unit.source: A signed and serialized publish license.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" /> class from a specified serialized and signed <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" />.
<paramref name="signedPublishLicense" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The license is invalid.
The secure environment for license activation and binding.
Attempts to acquire a <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" /> for a user or user group in a specified <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" /> for a user or user group in the specified <paramref name="secureEnvironment" />.
<paramref name="secureEnvironment" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The authentication failed.
The secure environment for license activation and binding.
Attempts to acquire a <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" /> for a user or user group in a specified <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" /> for a user or user group in the specified <paramref name="secureEnvironment" />.
The <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.AcquireUseLicenseNoUI%2A> method suppresses the Windows network authentication dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.AcquireUseLicenseNoUI%2A>メソッドは、Windows ネットワーク認証のダイアログ ボックスを表示しません。

trans-unit.source: If the license request is denied because the user does not have permission, <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.AcquireUseLicenseNoUI%2A> prevents the network authentication dialog box from displaying.
trans-unit.target: ユーザーに、アクセス許可があるないために、ライセンスの要求が拒否された場合<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.AcquireUseLicenseNoUI%2A>ネットワーク認証 ダイアログ ボックスを表示されないようにします。

trans-unit.source: Use silent acquisition when attempting to obtain licenses in a background task or in a non-user interface that might display confusing dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: バック グラウンド タスクまたは紛らわしいダイアログ ボックスが表示される非ユーザー インターフェイスでのライセンスを取得するサイレント取得しようとするとを使用します。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="secureEnvironment" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The authentication failed.
Gets the publisher-created content identifier.
The publisher-created content identifier.
trans-unit.target: 発行者が作成したコンテンツ識別子。

trans-unit.source: Publishers create a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.ContentId%2A> to identify the protected content.
trans-unit.target: パブリッシャーは、作成、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense.ContentId%2A>を保護されたコンテンツを識別します。

trans-unit.source: The rights management service to use for decrypting the license.
Returns a decrypted <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense" /> version of this signed <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" />.
A decrypted, unsigned version of this license.

The <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.DecryptUnsignedPublishLicense%2A> method allows the license owner and users who were granted <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight.ViewRightsData> to extract the original information that was encrypted when the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense> was created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.DecryptUnsignedPublishLicense%2A>メソッドでは、ライセンス所有者とユーザーが付与されている<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight.ViewRightsData>が元の情報を抽出するときに暗号化されて、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense>が作成されました。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cryptoProvider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets the contact name for the author or publisher of the content.
The contact name for the author or publisher of the content.
trans-unit.target: 作成者またはコンテンツの発行元の連絡先の名前。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.ReferralInfoName%2A> property is not encrypted and can be accessed even when the user does not yet have a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>.
trans-unit.target: によって返される文字列、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.ReferralInfoName%2A>プロパティは暗号化されず、ユーザーがあるない場合でもアクセスできる、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>です。

trans-unit.source: The returned string permits users to contact the publisher to request a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>.
trans-unit.target: 返される文字列により、ユーザーが要求する発行者に問い合わせ、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>です。

trans-unit.source: Gets the contact [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the author or publisher of the content.
The contact [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the author or publisher of the content.
trans-unit.target: 連絡先[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]作成者またはコンテンツの発行元。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.ReferralInfoUri%2A> property is not encrypted and can be accessed even when the user does not yet have a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>.
trans-unit.target: によって返される文字列、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.ReferralInfoUri%2A>プロパティは暗号化されず、ユーザーがあるない場合でもアクセスできる、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>です。

trans-unit.source: The returned string permits users to contact the publisher to request a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>.
trans-unit.target: 返される文字列により、ユーザーが要求する発行者に問い合わせ、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>です。

trans-unit.source: Returns the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xrml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xrml-md.md)] string that was used to create this license.
The serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xrml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xrml-md.md)] string that was used to create this license.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to use for acquiring a <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" />.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to use for acquiring a <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" />.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]を取得するために使用する、<see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" />です。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.UseLicenseAcquisitionUrl%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.AcquireUseLicense%2A> method when a user acquires a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.UseLicenseAcquisitionUrl%2A>プロパティを使用、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense.AcquireUseLicense%2A>メソッド、ユーザーを取得するとき、<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>です。
